did you add the virtualbox ppa?
no.. i downloaded the deb package from the vbox site
using the PPA will make things a OT easier for you
what is the output of: lsb_release -sc    please
as root or user
either

echo "deb http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/debian precise contrib" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/virtualbox.list; wget -q http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/debian/oracle_vbox.asc -O- | sudo apt-key add -
sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install virtualbox-4.1
also, using the PPA will mean your software will get updated
i know the one from the vbox website in 4.1.14.. when in the repo is 4.1.12
in the vbox repo is later than the deb file they give on the site? Really?
here's the version from virualbox web site...   virtualbox-4.1_4.1.14-77440~Ubuntu~precise_amd64.deb
